author: Special Correspondent
text:
School students near Nettapakkam demonstrated on the road on Monday demanding the closure of a government-run liquor shop in their area.

Classes boycotted

Boycotting classes, the students comprising boys and girls protested near the Kallikulam on the road that connect Madukarai and Puducherry.

Traffic was affected due to protest by the students. Police officials immediately rushed to the spot and held talks with them.

The students alleged that in spite of repeated complaints, the authorities opened the shop in the area where schools are located.

To intensify stir

They also said they would intensify their stir if the authorities failed to respond to their demand.
title: School students stage protest
